sentences.en: A intelligence system for the analysis of river and sea physiognomy is presented in this paper.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍了河海地质地貌的智能分析系统.

sentences.en: For years physiognomy - the idea that a person's face is a reflection of his character - was sneered at.
sentences.cn: 但有门学科却是个例外,最近正试图获得新生.

sentences.en: He was fascinated by her physiognomy – the prominent nose, brooding eyes, and thick hair.
sentences.cn: 他被她的相貌—高挺的鼻梁、深邃的双眸和浓密的秀发—迷住了。

sentences.en: He was fascinated by her physiognomy — the prominent nose, brooding eyes and thick hair.
sentences.cn: 他被她的外表——高挺的鼻梁、深邃的双眸和浓密的秀发——迷住了。

sentences.en: His eyes were good, but otherwise there was nothing remarkable in his physiognomy.
sentences.cn: 他的眼睛长得好, 其它方面倒也别无特别突出的地方.

sentences.en: His shape , now divested of cloak, I perceived harmonized in squareness with his physiognomy.
sentences.cn: 我发现,他此刻脱去斗篷以后的身材, 同他容貌的方正很相配.

sentences.en: Just now I showed him only physiognomy of earth which is one of the four physiognomies.
sentences.cn: 刚刚我只是将我四大中地大的部分展现给他看.

sentences.en: Mr. Cha Buduo has the same physiognomy as you and I.
sentences.cn: 差不多先生的相貌和你和我都差不多.

sentences.en: Mr. Sykes entered - a tall, stout man of about fifty, comely of feature , but feeble of physiognomy.
sentences.cn: 赛克斯先生进来了 ― ―这人又高又胖,约莫50岁, 眉目清秀, 一副优柔寡断的相貌.

sentences.en: Not physiognomy alone nor brain alone is worthy for the Muse.
sentences.cn: 我说,值得歌唱的不仅仅是相貌和头脑.

sentences.en: The hilltop ecological effect of Danxia Landform generated by the distinct physiognomy and topography was investigated.
sentences.cn: 首次探讨了丹霞地貌山顶生态效应现象,揭示特殊的地貌、形态所产生的特殊生态现象.

sentences.en: The results indicated that the vegetation could be classified as 4 physiognomy types and 16 community types.
sentences.cn: 结果表明,江湾机场的植被可划分为4个外貌类型、6个群落类型.

sentences.en: This paper presents a novel real - time texture synthesis algorithm on large scale 3 D physiognomy surface.
sentences.cn: 提出一种新的高效的大规模三维地貌纹理合成方法.

sentences.en: This physiognomy was strangely composed, it began by seeming humble , and ended by seeming severe.
sentences.cn: 这相貌是稀有的, 一眼看去象是谦卑, 看到后来,却又严肃.

sentences.en: When turning suddenly, he caught my gaze fastened on his physiognomy.
sentences.cn: 他突然转过头来, 发现我盯着看他的面貌.

words.tran_cn: [地理]地貌；[植]外貌；面相；[心理]相面术

trans.tran_en: the general appearance of a person’s face
